title: 非凡rpg随机装备
author: kBteR91k
txt_content: 怎么让identify里的随机装备，限定只能是某样？

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
我上面说清楚了怎么做

#物品名字你想要怎么写就写什么%c%是上面的颜色代码
  name: '%c%皮革靴子'





# 这里这个相反打开.
    reverse: true
    # List of the Materials which will be ignored/used on item generation. 
    # Adding mask * at the start or the end of name will include all the items which stats/ends with specified name: DIAMOND* will include all diamond items.
    black-list:
     #这里只设置一个物品
     #这是皮革靴子
    - 'CHAINMAIL_BOOTS'

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 你做一个随机物品包。物品ID就指定一个。不要用随机名称文本。属性那些改不改无所谓。然后你的这个封印物品设置这个随机物品包就好了吧。

replies.author: kBteR91k
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2019-6-1 15:35
你做一个随机物品包。物品ID就指定一个。不要用随机名称文本。属性那些改不改无所谓。然后你的这个封印物品 ...
额怎么给他设置成这个随机物品包鸭

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
你直接去tiers品质随机复制一个然后重命名文件名

我复制了一个普通品质的重命名为nbnbnb.yml

name: nbnbnb 
# 这个改成和文件名一样
color: '&f' # Tier name color
prefix-chance: 100.0 # Chance the item will have random prefix.
suffix-chance: 100.0 # Chance the item will have random suffix.

# This section defines the item display and attributes.
item:
  # Item display name and lore.
  # All placeholders are above.
#物品名字你想要怎么写就写什么%c%是上面的颜色代码
  name: '%c%皮革靴子'
  lore:
  - '&8&m               &f  「 INFO 」  &8&m               '
  - '&7Type: &f%TYPE%'
  - '&7Tier:%c% %TIER%'
  - ''
  - '%SOULBOUND%'
  - '%CLASS%'
  - '%LEVEL%'
  - ''
  - '%ENCHANTS%'
  - '&8&m               &f  「 DMG/DEF 」  &8&m              '
  - '%ARMOR_TYPES%'
  - '%AMMO_TYPE%'
  - '%DAMAGE_TYPES%'
  - '&8&m               &f  「 STATS 」  &8&m               '
  - '%CRITICAL_DAMAGE%'
  - '%DURABILITY%'
  - ''
  - '%SET%'
  - '%GEM%'
  
  # Defines the color for Leather armor.
  color:
    random: true # If 'true' colors the leather armor to random color.
    rgb: 255,255,255 # When 'random' is false colors leather armor to specified RGB color.
  
  # Defines the Materials which can be generated by this tier.
  materials:
    # 这里这个相反打开.
    reverse: true
    # List of the Materials which will be ignored/used on item generation. 
    # Adding mask * at the start or the end of name will include all the items which stats/ends with specified name: DIAMOND* will include all diamond items.
    black-list:
     #这里只设置一个物品
     #这是皮革靴子
    - 'CHAINMAIL_BOOTS'
  
  # Here you can define the 'durability' values for items.
  # It can be used to make items with custom models/textures from ResourcePack.
  material-data:
    # Makes the 'black-list' below to work as white-list.
    reverse: true
    # Makes the item unbreakable.
    unbreakable: true
    # Data values which will be ignored/used on item generation, if item material is not listed in 'special' section.
    black-list:
    - 1
    - 2
    - 3
    # Here you can define values for the materials which will override values from the list above.
    special:
      # Material name.
      # Item with this material will use only values below, not from the list above.
      DIAMOND_SWORD:
      - 10
      - 11
      GOLD_SWORD:
      - 12
      - 13
  
  # Item enchantments.
  enchants:
    # Min. and max. enchants for item.
    min: 1
    max: 3
    # Only 'safe' enchants (Swords can't have Protection, etc).
    safe-only: false
    # Enchants list. 
    # Syntax: Enchantment:LevelMin:LevelMax. List of Enchants.
    list: 
    - ARROW_KNOCKBACK:1:1
    - ARROW_INFINITE:1:3
    - ARROW_FIRE:2:5
  
  # Damage Types, which will be added (with a chance) on item generation. List of Damage Types.
  damage-types: 
    # Damage Type Name. Case insensitive.
    physical:
      # Chance the item will have this damage type
      # 100% and higher chances are always has higher priority.
      chance: 100.0 
      # Min. and max. damage value.
      min: 2.6
      max: 5.8
  
  # The same as above, but for Defense Types. List of Defense Types.
  armor-types:
    # Defense Type Name. Case insensitive.
    physical:
      chance: 100.0
      min: 10.0
      max: 25.0
  
  # Ammo Types, which can be applied to the Bows. List of Ammo Types.
  # Only one Ammo Type will be applied!
  # Syntax: Ammo_Type: Chance
  ammo-types:
    ARROW: 100.0
  
  
  # Hand Types, which can be applied to the Bows. List of Hand Types.
  # Only one Hand Type will be applied!
  # Syntax: Hand_Type: Chance
  hand-types:
    ONE: 100.0
  
  # Here you can define some item restrictions like required player class and level,
  # make item requires soulbound or be untradeable,
  # and some other things.
  restrictions:
    # When true adds Soulbound requirements on the item.
    # Soulbound module must be enabled.
    soulbound: false
    # When true makes item untradeable.
    # Soulbound module must be enabled.
    untradeable: false
    # Adds player level requirements on the item.
    # Syntax: MinLevel-MaxLevel.
    levels: 0-10
    # Increases all the item stats, damage and defense types by specified value depends on item level.
    # You can use it to make items with higher level always have better stats than items with lower level.
    # Set to 1 to disable.
    # The formula is: %scale% * %item-lvl%
    level-scale-values: 1.025
    # Damage, Defense types and Item Stat blacklist for the option above.
    level-scale-black-list:
    - CRITICAL_DAMAGE
    # Modifies the Damage/Defense or Item Stat values depends on item Material or Item Type or Item Group.
    # You can remove this section if you don't want to use it.
    material-modifiers: 
      # Material or Item Type or Item Group name
      sword: 
        # Modifiers for damage types. 
        # Allowed sections: 'damage-types', 'defense-types' and 'item-stats'. You can add all of them.
        damage-types: 
          # Damage/Defense type or Item Stat name. Depends on section name (see above).
          # Syntax: Name: Modifier (decimal number).
          physical: 1.5 
      iron_helmet:
        defense-types:
          physical: 1.25
      axe:
        item-stats:
          CRITICAL_DAMAGE: 1.5
    # Adds specified classes to item player class requirements.
    # You must have a defined class plugin in the config to make this works.
    classes:
    - Warrior
    - Templar
    - Cleric
    # Min. and max. amount of possible Item Stats, Damage and Defense Types.
    # Set -1 to unlimit.
    min-item-stats: -1. 
    max-item-stats: -1
    min-damage-types: 1
    max-damage-types: 3
    min-defense-types: 1
    max-defense-types: 3
    
  # Item Stats which will be added (with a chance) on item generation. List of Item Stats
  item-stats: 
    # Item Stat name.
    CRITICAL_RATE:
      default:
        # Chance the item will have this stat.
        chance: 10.0 
        # Min. and max. stat value.
        min: 1.0.
        max: 7.25
    CRITICAL_DAMAGE:
      default:
        chance: 10.0
        min: 1.0
        max: 1.25
  
  # Socket Types which will be added (with a chance) on item generation. List of Socket Types.
  sockets: 
    # Socket Type name.
    GEM:
      chance: 45.0
      min: 0
      max: 2
    ESSENCE:
      chance: 25.0
      min: 0
      max: 1
    RUNE:
      chance: 10.0
      min: 0
      max: 1

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2019-6-1 16:09 编辑 

这里是封印物品配置文件unidentified-items: 
    #封印物品的ID
  nbnbnb:
    #类型随机品质
    type: TIERS
    #nbnbnb随机物品包
    item-id: 'nbnbnb'
    #鉴定书ID
    tome: nbnbnb
    #封印物品名字
    name: '&f&k封印之物'
    #封印物品描述
    lore:
    - '&8&m               &f  「 INFO 」  &8&m               '
    - '&f? &7Type: &fUnidentified Item'
    - '&f? &7Tier: &fCommon'
    - '&8&m               &f  「 STATS 」  &8&m               '
    - '&7Find an &fCommon Identify Tome&7 to'
    - '&7indentify the item!'
    item-flags:
    - HIDE_ATTRIBUTES

鉴定书配置文件

identify-tomes:
  nbnbnb:
    material: 'ENCHANTED_BOOK:0'
    name: '&fnb鉴定书'
    lore:
    - '&8&m               &f  「 INFO 」  &8&m               '
    - '&f> &7Type: &fIdentify Tome'
    - '&f> &7Tier: &4nbnbnb'
    - '&8&m               &f  「 LORE 」  &8&m               '
    - '&7This tome can identify the'
    - '&7common tier items only.'
    - '&8&m              &f  「 USAGE 」  &8&m              '
    - '&7Drag+Drop on item to identify.'

replies.txt_content:

我复制了一个普通品质的重命名为nbnbnb.yml
这个装备品质和随机装备这个我都会，但是装备品质那里，不知道怎么设置指定的装备

replies.txt_content:
